testsuite.test:
Verify Preconditions
Instructions: 1) Make sure you have good GPS reception (best done outside). 2) Click 'GO' to start testing.
Expected behaviour: See green colored line on the device screen.

Widget Device DeviceStateInfo onPositionRetrieved Verify that callback fires
Instructions: Click 'GO', to retreive your location.
Expected behaviour: See green colored line on the device screen.

requestPositionInfo cellid Verify return value is of type PositionInfo
Instructions: Click 'GO' to get position!
Expected behaviour: See green colored line on the device screen.

requestPositionInfo gps Verify return value is of type PositionInfo
Instructions: Click 'GO' to get position!
Expected behaviour: See green colored line on the device screen.

requestPositionInfo gps Try getting position three times in a row
Instructions: Click 'GO' to start test!
Expected behaviour: See green colored line on the device screen.

requestPositionInfo agps Verify return value is of type PositionInfo
Instructions: Click 'GO' to get position!
Expected behaviour: See green colored line on the device screen.

requestPositionInfo Let user verify position
Instructions: Click 'GO', to retreive your location.
Expected behaviour: Is the above your current position?

requestPositionInfo Verify properties of returned PositionInfo object
Instructions: Follow the instructions on the screen.
Expected behaviour: See green colored line on the device screen.
